about.subtitle: Tentang Kami
about.title: Tentang PT. Nirvana Niaga Sejahtera
about.short: Nirvana Niaga Sejahtera is one of the professional seafood processing companies in Indonesia.
about.long: An honor for us to introduce PT. Nirvana Niaga Sejahtera is one of the professional seafood processing companies in Indonesia. To stay in the forefront line of the dynamic global fisheries market, we are committed to doing our best to ensure the proper and good processing techniques to produce quality seafood products.

services.stat2: Bulan dalam setahun pengiriman tanpa henti
